summary: An Iranian-born teenager living in suburban New Jersey thinks of herself as simply an American until anti-Iranian sentiment erupts in her community after American hostages are held in Iran.
cast: Mariam Parris|David Ackert|Shaun Toub|Shohreh Aghdashloo|Maz Jobrani|Victor Jory|Sabine Singh|Michael Blieden|Jason Nash|Goli Samii|Armin Amiri|John Necef|Gillian Thomas|Al Nazemian
keywords: assassin|character name as title|one word title|iran|hijab
title: Maryam
